commit.message: Fix Win8301247Test to make it log exception if any occurs after the laucnher is started. Prior this change test just hang with no output.
Add JPackageCommand.discardStdout(boolean) and JPackageCommand.discardStderr(boolean). Better BasicTest.testErrorsAlwaysPrinted()

Add Executor.discardStdout() and Executor.discardStderr(). stsdout and st–≤err are captured individually and dumped sequentially (no stderr redirection into stdout any more for process builder). Bugfix WindowsHelper.findAppLauncherPIDs() that relied on specific order or merged stderr and stdout.
